title: U.S. Should Take A Tougher Stand Toward China, Report's Authors Say
teaser: Two former U.S. diplomats argue it's time to think of China less as a trading partner and more as a threat. Steve Inskeep talks to Robert Blackwill and Ashley Tellis about a paper they co-wrote.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
